rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering natural light. Bohemian style decor integrated with vibrant textiles and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area for easy dining and socializing.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed for wheelchair accessibility, including lower countertops and accessible storage. Bohemian accents with open shelving.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Located on the ground floor to ensure accessibility with en-suite bathroom featuring wide doorways and grab bars as per Vastu guidelines for north or east facing walls.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Accessible room designed with a simple layout and natural light. Bohemian decor and ample space.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library area with built-in bookshelves, floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural lighting, and adjustable seating to cater to wheelchair users.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with ramps integrated into the design according to local building norms and Vastu principles. The doorway is designed with an inviting aesthetic that incorporates Bohemian motifs.
Secondary access point ensuring multiple entryways, also adhering to accessibility standards.

garage.description: Two-car garage with wheelchair-accessible ramp and space for additional storage. The design includes energy-efficient lighting and ventilation.
